Other Information.Test Conditions: 298 K, FO mode, 1 M NaCl as draw solution
Other Information.Additional Info: Rejection rate >98.5% for 10 h due to size exclusion and adsorption properties.
Optimal membrane TFN 0.2 achieved >90% NaCl rejection.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale and adsorption via π-π interactions and hydrogen bonding

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Doxycycline rejection: >98.5%, Water flux enhancement: 94.31% compared to TFC control membrane

Other Information.Additional Info: The material showed improved hydrophilicity and antifouling properties when incorporated into the PA layer of TFN membranes.
